name: Space Wizard (dragn1821)
description:
This game was developed as part of the Metroidvania Month 10 Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-10).  We are excited to release this as our 2nd Game Jam game, and our 2nd game period.  Development of this game took place over 30 days from November 15th, 2020 thru December 15th, 2020.  While we were only able to finish one level, we do feel that we were able to incorporate several elements of the Metroid-vania genre of games.

Please let us know what you think.

CONTROLS:
While the game works best using a gamepad controller, you can also use the keyboard.

Gamepad Controls:

  • Up, Down, Left, Right = DPad or Left Thumbstick
  • Select & Jump = A Button
  • Melee Attack = X Button
  • Range Attack = Y Button

Keyboard Controls:

  • Up, Down, Left, Right = Arrow keys
  • Select & Jump = C
  • Melee Attack = Z
  • Range Attack = X

VERSIONS:

  • 1.0.0 - Initial release of the game.
  • 1.0.1 - Fixed some missing details in the background of one of the rooms.
